The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 February is 3,426,193 (6,087 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 31 January, there were 145,012 new confirmed cases (257.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 January, there were 199,734 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 27% (54,722 fewer cases).
